question: Which of the following is not true regarding the genetic manipulation of animals in order to create more novel and attractive pets?

answers.text: The earliest genetic manipulation of pets can be seen in 1873 in the Americas with the rise of the American Kennel Club.
In Europe, the earliest kennel clubs began as dog show societies in England in 1859.
Genetic manipulation took place in Victorian England, where pet keeping appeared in all social classes.
A recent new breed, the Biewer terrier, was recognized in January 2021 in the United States.
